Life & Style

Towards Fifty, UAE Celebrates its Golden Jubilee National Day 2021

Ambassador of UAE, H. E Obaid Saeed Aldhaheri, writes to Việt Nam News on the Golden Jubilee National Day, which falls on December 2.
Life & Style

HCM City Travel Fair to be held online this year

The annual HCM City Travel Fair will for the first time be held virtually from December 4 to 25 after COVID-19 caused the cancellation of its usual summer schedule, according to the city Department of Tourism.
Life & Style

Get a sugar rush with this 40-year-old dessert in Hà Nội

With traditional flavor of Chè dishes, Chè Bà Thơm has become a famous brand in Quán Thánh street, Hà Nội and for over 40 years, is still loved by diners all over the country.
Life & Style

Buckwheat flower festival held online for first time

The 7th Buckwheat Flower Festival in Hà Giang Province has been held online for the first time, due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
Life & Style

Art For You calls on art lovers to support local artists

Hundreds of artworks by more than 200 artists will be presented at Art For You – the only affordable art fair in Việt Nam, from today.
